properties.name: value
properties.description: Data for displaying list of pagination

properties.name: size
properties.description: Size of records which is displaying on one page

properties.name: ratios
properties.description: Array for set up flex ratio between field of record

properties.name: identifierField
properties.description: Field which is identifier for emit data from pickup event

events.name: previous
events.description: Emitted event for switching to previous page.

events.name: next
events.description: Emitted event for switching to next page.

events.name: pickup
events.description: Emitted when click on record, will emit current record data or identifier with index on current page.
